item.title: 前空中客车公司老板敦促欧洲快速推动制造武装机器人
item.description: 这位前空中客车公司负责人敦促欧洲暂时将注意力从大型军备项目转移到机器人无人机等灵活的新技术上，以便向莫斯科和华盛顿证明，欧洲能够在本十年末为其安全做出贡献。【原文：The former head of Airbus has urged Europe to shift attention for now from major arms projects to nimble new technologies like robotic drones to demonstrate to Moscow and Washington that it can make a difference to its security by the end of the decade.】

item.title: 加拿大就美国钢铝关税向世贸组织提出争端申诉
item.description: 加拿大贸易机构周四表示，加拿大已就美国对来自加拿大的某些钢铁和铝产品征收进口关税一事请求与美国进行世贸组织争端磋商。【原文：Canada has requested WTO dispute consultations with the U.S. over its imposition of import duties on certain steel and aluminium products from Canada, the trade body said on Thursday.】

item.title: 据彭博新闻社报道，英美资源集团计划进一步裁员
item.description: 据彭博新闻社周四报道，英美资源集团正计划在其公司办公室裁减更多的工作岗位，该公司旨在将业务重心重新放在铜和铁矿石开采上的更广泛重组正在顺利进行。【原文：Anglo American is planning to cut more jobs at its corporate office, Bloomberg News reported on Thursday, as a broader restructuring aimed at refocusing the miner's operations on copper and iron ore mining is well under way.】

item.title: 美国金融业监管局勒令 Stifel 向美国家庭支付 1.325 亿美元赔偿金
item.description: 金融业监管局仲裁小组责令 Stifel Financial 向一个家庭支付 1.325 亿美元，原因是该公司虚假陈述了复杂结构性票据的风险，造成了他们的律师所说的 "惊人 "损失。【原文：Stifel Financial was ordered by a Financial Industry Regulatory Authority arbitration panel to pay a family $132.5 million for misrepresenting the risk of complex structured notes, causing what their lawyer called "staggering" losses.】

item.title: 韩国 NH Venture 公司关注对以色列科技初创企业的投资
item.description: 韩国 NH 风险投资公司首席执行官表示，该公司正寻求向以色列科技公司投资数百万美元，力求将以色列的独创性与韩国的制造能力结合起来，打造更大规模的公司。【原文：Korea's NH Venture Investment is looking to invest millions of dollars in Israeli tech firms, its chief executive said, seeking to combine Israeli ingenuity with Korean manufacturing prowess to build larger companies.】

item.title: 韩国 NH Venture 公司关注对以色列科技初创企业的投资
item.description: 韩国 NH 风险投资公司首席执行官表示，该公司正寻求向以色列科技公司投资数百万美元，力求将以色列的独创性与韩国的制造能力结合起来，打造更大规模的公司。【原文：Korea's NH Venture Investment is looking to invest millions of dollars in Israeli tech firms, its chief executive said, seeking to combine Israeli ingenuity with Korean manufacturing prowess to build larger companies.】

item.title: 美联储打破惯例，尚未公布 2024 年财务报告
item.description: 美联储今年打破了长期以来每年发布前一年财务状况预告的惯例。【原文：The Federal Reserve has broken this year with its long-standing practice of releasing an annual preview of its finances for the preceding year.】

item.title: 数据显示，阿联酋对美国的铝出口在特朗普加征关税前大幅增长
item.description: 美国商务部的数据显示，阿拉伯联合酋长国对美国的铝出口在3月份的前11天猛增，因为买家在美国关税于周三生效前囤积了来自其第二大供应商的货物。【原文：United Arab Emirates exports of aluminium to the U.S. jumped in the first 11 days of March, data from the U.S. Department of Commerce showed, as buyers stocked up on shipments from their second-biggest supplier before the U.S. tariffs took effect on Wednesday.】

item.title: 多娜泰拉-范思哲的大胆设想让品牌在詹尼遇害后一直备受瞩目
item.description: 多娜泰拉-范思哲（Donatella Versace）在其兄长詹尼（Gianni）近三十年前遇害后帮助确保了家族时装帝国的生存，她将辞去品牌首席设计师一职。【原文：Donatella Versace, who helped to ensure the survival of the family fashion empire after the killing of her brother Gianni almost three decades ago, is to step down as the brand's chief designer, its owner announced on Thursday.】

item.title: 国际投资基金（IIF）称，2 月份中国股市和新兴市场债务出现大量资金流入
item.description: 一家金融贸易集团周四发布的报告称，2 月份，外国人在新兴市场投资组合中增加了近 160 亿美元的资金，投资者纷纷增持中国股票以及各发展中经济体的债务。【原文：Foreigners added nearly $16 billion to their emerging market portfolios in February, with investors loading up on Chinese stocks as well as debt across developing economies, a report from a finance trade group said on Thursday.】

item.title: UAW 工会对大众汽车提出不公平劳动行为指控
item.description: 美国汽车工人联合会（United Auto Workers）工会周四表示，它对大众汽车提出了不公平劳动行为指控，称这家汽车制造商正试图削减田纳西州一家工厂的工作岗位，该工会去年在田纳西州的选举中获胜后，正在就第一份合同进行谈判。【原文：The United Auto Workers union said Thursday it filed unfair labor practice charges against Volkswagen, saying the automaker is trying to cut jobs at a factory in Tennessee where the union is negotiating its first contract after winning an election there last year.】

item.title: 经济担忧和供需预期拖累石油下跌
item.description: 由于市场权衡了宏观经济忧虑和供需预期，油价在前一交易日因美国汽油库存降幅大于预期而飙升后于周四下滑。【原文：Oil prices slipped on Thursday after surging in the previous session on a larger-than-expected draw in U.S. gasoline stocks, as markets weighed macroeconomic concerns and demand versus supply expectations.】

item.title: 美国掉期投资者为硬着陆押注付出沉重代价
item.description: 美国利率期权的投资者正在为那些在利率急剧下降时将获得回报的交易支付溢价，这表明衍生品市场正在为世界最大经济体的经济放缓程度超出预期进行定价。【原文：Investors in U.S. interest rate options are paying a premium for trades that will pay off if there is a dramatic drop in interest rates, suggesting the derivatives market is pricing in a sharper slowdown than anticipated in the world's largest economy.】

item.title: 土耳其独立新闻网站在谷歌调整后面临关闭风险
item.description: 土耳其几家独立媒体周四发表联合声明称，在谷歌改变算法导致读者流量大幅减少后，这些媒体面临被关闭的潜在风险。【原文：Several independent media outlets in Turkey face a potential risk of closure after algorithm changes made by Google led to a significant reduction in reader traffic, a joint statement from the outlets said on Thursday.】

item.title: 西班牙认为对美国液化天然气的依赖性上升没有风险
item.description: 西班牙能源部长萨拉-阿格森（Sara Aagesen）周四表示，在美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）威胁升级更广泛的全球贸易战之际，她并不认为欧洲对来自美国的液化天然气的日益依赖会带来任何风险。【原文：Spanish Energy Minister Sara Aagesen said on Thursday she did not see any risk in Europe's growing reliance on liquefied natural gas from the United States amid threats by President Donald Trump to escalate a wider global trade war.】

item.title: 华尔街日报》报道：特朗普家族与 Binance 美国分公司举行交易谈判
item.description: 据《华尔街日报》周四援引知情人士的话报道，唐纳德-特朗普总统家族的代表已就入股加密货币交易所 Binance 美国分部进行了谈判。【原文：Representatives of President Donald Trump's family have held talks to take a financial stake in the U.S. arm of crypto exchange Binance, the Wall Street Journal reported on Thursday, citing people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: Terabase Energy 获得 1.3 亿美元资金用于扩大太阳能技术部署
item.description: 太阳能技术公司 Terabase Energy 周四宣布，该公司已获得由软银领投的 1.3 亿美元融资，用于扩大大型太阳能项目的技术部署规模。【原文：Solar technology company Terabase Energy announced on Thursday it has secured a funding of $130 million, led by SoftBank, to scale its technology deployment for large solar projects.】

item.title: 欧洲顶级基金经理开始从寒冷中引进国防类股票
item.description: 在客户和一些政界人士的压力下，欧洲资产管理公司正在重新考虑他们的国防投资政策，要求放松限制，帮助资助欧洲大陆的重新武装竞赛。【原文：European asset managers are reconsidering their policies on investing in defence, under pressure from clients and some politicians to loosen restrictions and help fund the continent's race to re-arm.】

item.title: 华尔街巨头纽约银行收购 EquiLend 少数股权
item.description: 位于华尔街证券借贷核心的金融科技公司 EquiLend 周四表示，它已获得美国银行业巨头纽约银行（BNY）一家附属公司的少数股权投资。【原文：EquiLend, a fintech at the heart of securities lending on Wall Street, said on Thursday it has secured a minority investment from an affiliate of U.S. banking giant BNY .】

item.title: SoFi 签订了高达 50 亿美元的贷款协议，金融科技借贷日渐兴盛
item.description: SoFi周四表示，它已与资产管理公司蓝猫资本（Blue Owl Capital）管理的基金敲定了一项高达50亿美元的协议，将在其金融应用程序上提供个人贷款。【原文：SoFi said on Thursday it has finalized an agreement of up to $5 billion with funds managed by asset manager Blue Owl Capital to provide personal loans on its finance app, highlighting the increasing shift of consumers from traditional banks to fintech lenders.】

item.title: 数据公布后，美联储有望在 6 月开始 2025 次降息
item.description: 周二，交易商押注美联储将在6月重启降息，因为政府数据显示美国上月生产者价格意外持平，每周申请失业救济人数下降。【原文：The Federal Reserve is seen restarting interest-rate cuts in June, traders bet on Tuesday, as government data showed U.S. producer prices were unexpectedly flat last month and weekly jobless claims fell.】

item.title: 欧佩克+"创纪录的燃料出口削弱了该组织的原油供应削减力度
item.description: 据行业数据和分析师称，"欧佩克+"的成品油出口量创下了历史新高，削弱了该组织原油产量限制的影响，因为包括沙特阿拉伯在内的成员国都在寻求提高收入和市场份额。【原文：OPEC+ has exported a record amount of refined products, blunting the impact of the group's crude output curbs, as members including Saudi Arabia, seek to boost their revenues and market share, according to industry data and analysts.】

item.title: 部长称意大利正在部分使馆测试星链（Starlink）天线
item.description: 意大利一位部长周四表示，意大利已在全球四个大使馆安装了星链（Starlink）天线，以测试其功能，但尚未与埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）的公司签署国家安全合同。【原文：Italy has installed Starlink antennas in four embassies around the world to test their functionality, but has not signed a national security contract with Elon Musk's company, a minister said on Thursday.】

item.title: 美国每周申请失业救济人数下降，劳动力市场保持稳定
item.description: 上周新申请失业救济的美国人数有所下降，但政府大幅削减开支和贸易战升级威胁着劳动力市场的稳定。【原文：The number of Americans filing new applications for unemployment benefits fell last week, but sharp government spending cuts and an escalating trade war threaten labor market stability.】

item.title: 美国 2 月份生产者价格保持不变
item.description: 2 月份美国生产者价格意外持平，但降温趋势不太可能持续，因为进口关税预计将在未来几个月内提高商品价格。【原文：U.S. producer prices were unexpectedly unchanged in February, but the cooling trend is unlikely to be sustained as tariffs on imports are expected to raise prices of goods in the coming months.】

item.title: 多娜泰拉-范思哲卸任品牌创意总监一职
item.description: 范思哲的所有者卡普里控股公司（Capri Holdings）周四表示，多娜泰拉-范思哲将在担任范思哲品牌首席创意官近三十年后卸任。【原文：Donatella Versace is to step down as chief creative officer of the Versace brand after almost three decades in the role, owner Capri Holdings said on Thursday.】

item.title: Meta 将从 3 月 18 日起在美国测试社区笔记
item.description: Meta 公司周四表示，它将从 3 月 18 日起在美国的社交媒体平台上开始测试社区注释，而在此之前的两个月，它曾因保守派的多年批评而关闭了美国的事实核查项目。【原文：Meta said on Thursday it would begin testing community notes on its social media platforms in the United States from March 18, two months after shutting down its U.S. fact-checking program following years of criticism from conservatives.】

item.title: 如果欧盟不取消威士忌关税，特朗普威胁征收 200% 的葡萄酒关税
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普表示，如果欧盟不取消对威士忌征收的关税，他将对所有从欧盟出口的葡萄酒和其他酒类产品征收 200% 的葡萄酒关税。【原文：U.S. President Donald Trump said that he would put a 200% wine tariff on all wines and other alcoholic products coming out of the European Union if the bloc did not remove its tariff on whiskey.】

item.title: 独家报道T. Rowe Price公司治理主管唐娜-安德森（Donna Anderson）将于年底退休
item.description: 唐娜-安德森（Donna Anderson）是 T. Rowe Price 公司的公司治理负责人，在投资界的一系列热点话题上颇有发言权，资产管理公司告诉路透社，她打算在今年年底退休。【原文：Donna Anderson, who heads corporate governance at T. Rowe Price and has been a powerful voice on a range of hot-button topics in the investment world, intends to retire at the end of this year, the asset manager told Reuters.】

item.title: 消息人士称贝莱德将任命俞培华为新任中国基金主管
item.description: 两位知情人士透露，贝莱德已聘请原安盛中国基金合资企业负责人俞蓓华担任其中国业务的新负责人，这家美国资产管理公司将继续对中国业务进行全面改革，以提高业绩。【原文：BlackRock has hired Yu Beihua, formerly head of AXA's China fund joint venture, as the new boss of its China business, two people with knowledge of the matter said, as the U.S. asset manager continues an overhaul of the unit to improve performance.】
